title: Pixel 4 XL screen static on the camera screen
content:
I'm having an issue where my Pixel 4 XL has a lot of static noise on the screen when trying to take a picture. The pictures themselves turn out fine, but live HDR may be causing an issue. 

I first set up the phone with a dummy account so I could show it off to my family and friends while I was preparing my previous phone for transfer. That was when I first noticed the issue, but after doing a factory reset and setting up with my main account the issue persists. All camera modes as well as video mode have the issue.

I have tried connected and disconnected from service, with 90 Hz forced on and off, before and after updating, and with both resolutions. Am I the only one having this issue?
